issue.title: [CI] Suppress shell warning on travis-ci
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4537](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4537). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Suppress shell warnings like:

`+'[' == 1 ']'`
`/home/travis/build/apache/arrow/ci/travis_before_script_cpp.sh: line 81: [: ==: unary operator expected`

comments.body:
